name: @resin/abstract-sql-compiler
description: A translator for abstract sql into sql.

scripts.prepublish: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -c AbstractSQLCompiler.coffee && node node_modules/ometa-js/bin/ometajs2js --input AbstractSQLOptimiser.ometajs --output AbstractSQLOptimiser.js && node node_modules/ometa-js/bin/ometajs2js --input AbstractSQLRules2SQL.ometajs --output AbstractSQLRules2SQL.js
